issue.title: [JS] Error on Travis-CI during gulp build
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2188](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2188). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Failing builds:

https://travis-ci.org/apache/arrow/jobs/343649349
https://travis-ci.org/apache/arrow/jobs/343649353

Error message:

```Java

Error: potentially unsafe regular expression: ^(?:(?!(?:[\[!*+?$^"'.\\/]+)).)+
```

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2188?focusedCommentId=16369686) by Phillip Cloud (cpcloud):*
cc [~paul.e.taylor] as well

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2188?focusedCommentId=16369708) by Phillip Cloud (cpcloud):*
looks like we might've hit this: https://github.com/jonschlinkert/regex-not/issues/3

around the time when the patch was released here: https://github.com/jonschlinkert/regex-not/commit/335ef057744980b211a048f6b287b4690a9bc29f

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2188?focusedCommentId=16369710) by Phillip Cloud (cpcloud):*
restarted the builds to see if they pick up the new version

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2188?focusedCommentId=16369744) by Phillip Cloud (cpcloud):*
This is no longer a problem.
